title: The Audition
description: Will her talent take her all the way to Hollywood?Tessa Taylor is a regular girl; a college student with small problems and big dreams. She's got a happy family life, great friends, and a hot boyfriend. Her dream to make it big as an actress is her driving force, but even though she's a successful acting student in DC, she's struggling to get any type of work in Los Angeles. And Los Angeles is where all the auditions are.Then some unexpected news in her acting class leads to an exciting opportunity. Her big break could be right around the corner, but will chance meetings compromise her luck? And does Tessa really have what it takes to shine in an audition?The Audition is the prequel novelette to Taking the Lead: Adventures of a Hollywood Dog Walker, and is the first installment in the LA Lights Romantic Comedy series.If like Tessa, you're attracted to the bright lights of LA, download this light read.
author: Di Jones
